svg.text: News and Links
Top
* Status.im alpha is out and getting rave reviews It’s still buggy:
blog post on known bugs (also: they’re hiring!) To understand how
huge this could be, I recommend this FastCo article on WeChat in China
RELATED: Introduction of the Light Client for Dapp developers
Status.im alpha is out and getting rave reviews

on WeChat in China

* Etherplay also went live on the mainchain, and people are talking
about how they can’t stop playing . An interview with Ronan from
Etherplay
Etherplay also went live on the mainchain, and people are talking about
how they can’t stop playing .

Stuff for Dapp developers

Yoichi Hirai: Measuring the VM Test’s Coverage with the Lem Model

EthOn – organized Ethereum knowledge. Very cool visual aids.

thread Fully decentralized ENS tracking Dapp from the RexMLS team

Ecosystem
* Announcing MyEtherWallet v3.4 : The Node Switcher
* uPort is hiring 9 people – looks like they closed a fundraising round?
* Taylor Gerring’s Windows Installer for Mist: test release 1
* Shopping carts without servers on Ethereum
* Ethereum is “the most likely candidate” to become the global payment
network – Coinbase’s Brian Armstrong
* Coindesk published an article about ‘Enterprise Ethereum’ Joe Lubin
: Meeting was of a “bunch of companies, large and small … [who want to]
ensur[e] that core public Ethereum is strong and well resourced and that
the roadmap towards 2.0 and beyond has the best talent available to
execute it.” I feel like if you read this newsletter, you probably had
Week in Ethereum News
